body_html:
OpenCL support in TF still is not finalized.
I recommend reaching out to CodePlay (authors of ComputeCPP) for more help on this, as the compiler is still in beta, and it may be a compiler or a runtime issue.

Also, from what I can see in Platform Support Notes in CodePlay website, they do not have support for any AMD GPUs under ubuntu 16.04
Therefore, I will close this issue.

body:
OpenCL support in TF still is not finalized.
I recommend reaching out to CodePlay (authors of ComputeCPP) for more help on this, as the compiler is still in beta, and it may be a compiler or a runtime issue.

Also, from what I can see in Platform Support Notes in CodePlay website, they do not have support for any AMD GPUs under ubuntu 16.04
Therefore, I will close this issue.
